name: The Carrie McCray Memorial Literary Awards
content: Win up to $200 in The Carrie McCray Memorial Literary Awards for Novel First Chapter, Creative Nonfiction, Fiction and Poetry. Or become a member and submit Fiction, Nonfiction, Flash or Poetry as well to our Members Only section https://myscww.wildapricot.org/. Contest opens April 1 and closes May 31\. Submit: www.myscwa.org/contest
